Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Crockett
Reviews.Content: I used to install security cameras for a living, but a am retired now.  This product is a very good value.  I have installed 4 of these for myself and friends and all are working great. I buy them from my local Sams club store for $399.00. I like the familiar brand name and the 3 year warranty. Also I buy the 500 gb model and add another 1T hard drive if needed. The cameras are Samsung's newer models and work great especially during the day. Night Vision range is limited due to the low powered LED's. I always set the recording quality to the highest setting and the resolution to 4cif at 7fps. This gives me about 2 weeks (depending on the amount of motion the camera sees) of stored video on a 500gb hard drive. Outdoor cameras will pick up more motion due to insects at night.  I keep my motion sensitivity at 5 (halfway up). I always recommend using the mouse instead of the remote because it us much easier to manuver around the menues. The backup to the memory stick is easy to do and the remote software works great on my Windows 7 desktop.

Reviews.Title: Samsung V4040N 8 Channel
Reviews.Author: akbearpaw
Reviews.Content: I like the product but do not think I am utilizing all its capabilities, because the documentation is barely adequate. The User Manual is sparse and leaves questions unanswered. For example, some icons seen on the screen are not explained anywhere and I will have to call tech to decipher them. Have not had time yet to figure everything out but expect that when I do I will be happy with the system.

View from anywhere : Android, iPhone, iPad, Windows, Mac OS
